alert.note: Alert for Lower Treasure Valley; Owyhee Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 26 at 8:04PM MDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Canyon and northwestern Owyhee Counties through 845 PM MDT... At 804 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Elephant Butte, or 18 miles southwest of Caldwell, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Elephant Butte around 810 PM MDT. Marsing around 830 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
